location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden. Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter on the wreck of the Ahmed Shah, and reporting that the Governor approved of the proceedings adopted for obtaining restitution of the British property on board.
